item.title: A 'Lasciviously LA' Lunch With Crime Novelist James Ellroy
item.description: Ellroy's new novel, Perfidia, follows the Los Angeles police response to a brutal murder on the eve of Pearl Harbor. In a vintage steakhouse, the author discusses the book and his tech-free lifestyle.
